lead_paragraph: A.C. Milan acquired Robinho from Manchester City to bolster a formidable forward line and sold Klaas-Jan Huntelaar to the German club Schalke at European soccer’s transfer deadline.
snippet: A.C. Milan acquired Robinho from Manchester City to bolster a formidable forward line and sold Klaas-Jan Huntelaar to the German club Schalke at European soccer’s transfer deadline.

headline.main: Robinho Goes to A.C. Milan At the Transfer Deadline
headline.print_headline: Robinho Goes to A.C. Milan At the Transfer Deadline
